Dialogue: I didn’t go last year, Shiv?
Shiv? I think I’d remember our first Roy Endowment Creative New
York Ball together! I was crunching parks numbers like gravel
granola?
Honey, growing up I used to look at the pictures of the
And now – a little boy from St Paul is going. With the most beautiful
gal in the world!
What is it?
And here he comes. Bill. ‘The Best Boss That Ever Lived’. It’s like
Mandela fucked Santa and he gave birth to Bill.
Uh-huh, I knew, but I couldn’t say.
Come on, you genial old shitbag, get in here already, before it’s time
for me to retire.
No problem, Bill! I just hope I can eventually inspire similar
affection.
This is Greg. New guy I took under my wing when I started—
He doesn’t need your life story, Greg.
I think someone’s been watching a few too many spy movies since
they retired, eh, Bill?
Uh-huh?
Right. But – what is it Bill?
Uh-huh?
Well that’s – that’s a really reassuring image, Bill.
No thank you please leave me alone thank you!
Kendall, I wondered if I could grab five—
Yeah it’s something – something you don’t know about and you
maybe probably don’t want to know about?
Got it. Then excuse me while I get myself a knife, a fork and a side
salad.
Okay. Thank you, Rick. Thanks for that. Really useful.
So listen, Greg. It seems I have been exposed to a virus.
It’s a deadly virus. And now I’m fucked, forever.
It is bad. And I kind of need to share it – but anyone I talk to, I
effectively kill.
That’s the death pit, Greg. Take a look.
You’re family.
Kind of. But not really. For a number of years, there was an unofficial
company policy on our cruise lines that if a serious criminal incident
took place we would, if possible, sail not home, but to a Caribbean or
South American port where there were, so to speak, ‘friendly
authorities’ and we could minimize the incident to avoid negative PR.
Theft, sexual assault, rape, murder.
There’s hundreds here. Head of cruises himself, Lester used to go on
‘entertainment tours’ meeting the dancers and extending the contracts
of the ones who’d suck him off. Everyone we could we paid off. But
there’s emails, there’s correspondence. This could all blow. Who
knows if the
I don’t know! And anyone I ask for advice, I make complicit. Because
if you know about this, you should tell! But you can’t! Or you spread
the virus!
Sweetheart? Can I talk to you for a minute? I could really do with
some advice. Have you got time?
So, look, I don’t want to get you into all this but – well, Bill told me
as part of the handover – where some of the bodies are buried? But
they’re not very well-buried bodies. And they’re not really bodies.
They’re zombies, that might rise up from the dead at any moment.
And kill me.
I don’t— Maybe you don’t want to know?
But I’m worried if it does comes out – and it’s kind of bound to come
out – and it’s, while I’m in charge – I’m dead. Because I know and
I’m not doing anything. But if I do do something, I’ll have to, you
know, do something?
I’d like to, not carry the can, obviously, but also do the right thing?
Maybe?
What I’m thinking is, as soon as possible, a press conference. Get
everyone in – tell all the top execs and law guys. And we go public.
Outside investigation. Disinfectant of sunlight. Pin the rap on a tight
group of naughty, rotten apples?
Uh-huh. Right.
And that’s – good?
Where you sitting, Greg? In the basement? Or out by the dumpsters?
Tell me you’re at least in this time zone?
You know about that—?
Right, it’s just I think—
I don’t think that’s a fair characterization of—
Um, no—?
And can I ask where you heard about this?
Hey, you lump of fucking turducken.
Did you squeal?
Did you bitch me out, pig-man?
You bleated – about the press conference?
Yes you did.
Yes you did, you filthy piece of shit. I should drag you into the
kitchen and have them boil you until you’re sterile—
Oh my god, Greg, did you just touch me?
This is extraordinary. What are we going to do about this? Are these
assaults going to be ongoing?
And you’re telling me you didn’t do it?
Then who the fuck did, Greg? Ah? Because I only told you?
Oooh! Elvis! I thought we were getting the support act!
He’s kind of milking the walk?
